ai-thig5.1:1.4_0: even for as long as a finger-snap.
ai-thig5.1:2.1_0: Failing to find peace of heart,
ai-thig5.1:2.2_0: desire to be reborn in the senses.
ai-thig5.1:3.4_0: the aggregates, sense fields, and elements.
ai-thig5.1:4.2_0: I retired to a discreet place.
ai-thig5.1:5.4_0: and attained the ending of defilements.
ai-thig5.1:5.5_0: I have realized the six kinds of direct knowledge,
ai-thig5.1:5.6_0: and have fulfilled the Buddha’s instructions.
